v1BenefitType.title:
- BenefitTypePlatform: Platform receive benefit, then distribute benefit to user
 - BenefitTypePool: User receive benefit from pool directly

v1GoodType.title:
- GoodTypeClassicMining: Classic good: user pay for both device and other material, get all benefit
 - GoodTypeUnionMining: Union good: user pay for a part of material, get part of benefit
 - GoodTypeTechniqueFee: Fee good

v1OrderState.title:
- WaitPayment: Common state
 - Canceled: Platform confirm canceled
 - InService: Cyclation order state
